docs.snippet: GENEVA, Switzerland, Aug. 1 -- The subcommittee set up by the United Nations Special Committee 3f Inquiry on Palestine to investigate displaced persons camps laid out today a provisional itinerary of an eight-day flying visit to some of the largest...
docs.lead_paragraph: GENEVA, Switzerland, Aug. 1 -- The subcommittee set up by the United Nations Special Committee 3f Inquiry on Palestine to investigate displaced persons camps laid out today a provisional itinerary of an eight-day flying visit to some of the largest camps in Germany and Austria.
